author: kballuck@thehill.com (Kyle Balluck)
title: Obamas celebrate Vernon Jordan's 80th birthday
text:
August 16, 2015, 07:20 am Obamas celebrate Vernon Jordan's 80th birthday Getty Images 
The first family late Saturday attended a party to celebrate Vernon Jordan’s 80th birthday on Martha’s Vineyard. ADVERTISEMENT A White House official told a reporter traveling with President Obama during his vacation that the president toasted the civil rights activist at the Farm Neck Golf Club in Oak Bluffs, Mass., “extolling his kindness and generosity.”
“The president told attendees that Vernon's wisdom and enthusiasm are rare qualities,” the official added. 
Former President Bill Clinton also toasted his long-time confidante. 
Obama, Jordan and Clinton golfed together earlier in the day, along with Ron Kirk. 
Hillary Clinton was expected to attend the party , setting up her first encounter with Obama since Clinton formally launched her campaign for president. The White House official who spoke to the press did not discuss any contact between Hillary Clinton and Obama, however. 
Other guests at Jordan's birthday party included actor Morgan Freeman, historian Henry Louis Gates and Obama senior adviser Valerie Jarrett.
